articles.author: Anish Anand
articles.title: India vs Australia, Match 1: Hockey live scores and updates - ESPN India
articles.description: India's opening game of the five-match test series in Australia saw them put in a slow and ponderous performance and they were duly punished.
articles.content:
The Indian men's hockey team's preparations for the Paris Olympic Games got off to a terrible start with a 1-5 defeat against Australia in Perth, with Tom Wickham grabbing a brace.
Game 1 of the fiv… [+1400 chars]
